channel.title: Gift Exchange
channel.description: So, I realized today that I have extra copies of HL2 and Episode 1 sitting on my Steam account from when I bought the Orange Box. This makes me wonder: does anyone else have extra copies of games? And if so, would anyone be interested in trading them?

item.title: Gift Exchange
item.dc:creator: garrthbarrttinn
item.description:
If any1 wants TF2 I’ll trade, btu I already have the whole HL1 and 2 series plus Half-Life 2 DM, so you would have to give me something like Counter Strike.

Read full topic

item.title: Gift Exchange
item.dc:creator: geekofalltrades
item.description:
The_Assassin47:

how would we possibly trade them.

I gift you a game, you gift me one.

item.title: Gift Exchange
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
we could exchange steam accounts, mine has every valve game except l4d and cz

i dont really care as long as I get cs source and cs cz on the other account.
